mapper.select: select co.cname cname,lo.loan_money loanMoney,lo.loan_type loanType,p.pledge_name pledgeName,lo.apply_time applyTime, lo.repayment_type repaymentType,lo.repayment_time repaymentTime,lo.repayment_rate repaymentRate from loans lo join repayment re on lo.loan_id=re.lid join company co on co.cid=lo.loan_cid join pledge p on p.id=lo.pledge_id where lo.loans_status=4

select MIN(re.rid), re.rid,re.re_money reMoney,re.re_balance reBalace,re.nper nper,re.`status`,ul.uid,co.cid,co.cname,lo.loan_type,ul.telephone from repayment re join user_login ul on re.uid=ul.uid join loans lo ON lo.loan_id=re.lid join company co on co.cid=lo.loan_cid where ul.uid=#{uid} and re.status=0;

select re.rid,re.re_money reMoney,re.re_balance reBalace,re.nper nper,re.`status`,c.uid,c.cid,c.cname,l.loan_type,c.telephone from repayment re INNER join loans l on re.lid=l.loan_id INNER JOIN company c on l.loan_cid=c.cid where c.uid=#{uid} and re.status=0

select re.rid,re.re_money reMoney,re.re_balance reBalace,re.nper nper,re.`status`,ul.uid,co.cid,co.cname,lo.loan_type,ul.telephone from repayment re join user_login ul on re.uid=ul.uid join loans lo ON lo.loan_id=re.lid join company co on co.cid=lo.loan_cid where ul.uid=#{uid} and re.status=1;
mapper.update: update repayment set status=1 where rid=#{rid}
mapper.select: select total_money totalMoney,cm.* from customer_manager cm join user_login ul on cm.uid=ul.uid where telephone=#{tel};
